name: Paneer Butter Masala
description: Creamy tomato-based curry with soft paneer cubes, a North Indian restaurant favorite.

name: Masala Dosa
description: Crispy South Indian crepe filled with spiced potato filling, served with chutney and sambar.

name: Chicken Biryani
description: Aromatic basmati rice cooked with spiced chicken and saffron — a royal Hyderabadi delicacy.

name: Palak Paneer
description: Fresh spinach gravy blended with paneer cubes, flavored with mild spices and garlic.

name: Aloo Paratha
description: North Indian stuffed flatbread filled with spiced mashed potatoes and cooked with ghee.

name: Butter Chicken
description: Tender chicken cooked in a buttery, creamy tomato sauce with rich Indian spices.

name: Idli Sambar
description: Soft steamed rice cakes served with flavorful lentil sambar and coconut chutney.

name: Pav Bhaji
description: Mumbai street food — buttery mashed vegetable curry served with toasted pav bread.

name: Gulab Jamun
description: Soft fried dough balls soaked in rose-flavored sugar syrup — a classic Indian dessert.

name: Tandoori Chicken
description: Smoky grilled chicken marinated in yogurt and tandoori spices — fiery and flavorful.

name: Chole Bhature
description: Spicy chickpea curry served with fluffy fried bhature — a Delhi favorite.

name: Veg Pulao
description: Fragrant rice cooked with vegetables and light Indian spices — quick and comforting.

name: Hakka Noodles
description: Indo-Chinese stir-fried noodles with vegetables and soy sauce — street food classic.

name: Samosa
description: Crispy golden pastry filled with spiced potatoes and peas — the ultimate Indian snack.

name: Dal Tadka
description: Yellow lentils cooked with ghee, onions, tomatoes, and tempered with cumin and garlic.
